user_accounts

Class UserInfoCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • user_accounts.UserInfoCreator

  • public class UserInfoCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a directory for the Chemistry Passport Project in the root directory of the user's computer and creates a hidden file containing information about the user's progress for each kit. If the directory and the file already exists, then it does not recreate them. This class also provides the path of the file every time this application is started.
    Version:
    May 1, 2015
    Author:
    Sehr Sethi, Humaira Orchee and Charlotte Dye

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserInfoCreator(ChemGetPropertyValues propValues)
      Constructs a new UserInfoCreator that will provide the path to the hidden file that stores user information.

      • UserInfoCreator

        public UserInfoCreator(ChemGetPropertyValues propValues)
        Constructs a new UserInfoCreator that will provide the path to the hidden file that stores user information.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getFilePath

        public static java.lang.String getFilePath()
        Returns the path of the file containing user's information.
        Returns:
        The path of the file containing user's information.

      • setHideFile

        public static void setHideFile(java.io.File userInfoFile,
               boolean hide)
        Depending on the parameter, it hides or shows the specified file. This method is needed for on a Windows, putting a "." in front of file names don't hide the file and windows cannot write to a hidden file.
        Parameters:
        userInfoFile - The file to hide or to show.
        hide - If hide is true, then the file will be hidden. If hide is false then the file will be shown.
